attributes.action: open all mosques for the Ramadan late night prayer (taraweeh)
attributes.additional_details: I want to pray in the house of Allah and I need to go outside and get fresh air after my fast.
attributes.background: I want them to open the mosque for only the late night prayer. This takes place after 11. It is meant to thank Allah after Ramadan. those that feel well should only go. It isn’t compulsory but it is needed after people have been fasting.

rejection.details:
We're sorry we didn't reach your petition during Ramadan. 

You might like to sign this petition instead:

https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/317856
